title: Short Ghost and Horror Collection 004
creator: Various
description: A collection of fifteen stories featuring ghoulies, ghosties, long-leggedy beasties and things that go bump in the night. Expect shivers up your spine, the smell of human flesh, and the occasional touch of wonder. Readers include: Peter Piazza Bellona Times flansburgh38 Donald Finch Tom Hackett Gregg Margarite Linda Ferguson Sean Michael Hogan Bernard Spiel James Christopher M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; ghost; horror
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
